ElectricityEmssnFctrSet.name: ElectricityEmssnFctrSet
ElectricityEmssnFctrSet.description: Represents the factors that are used to convert electricity usage into CO₂e, CO₂, CH₄, and N₂O values. This record holds data on the breakdown of sources of electricity by fuel type (grid mixes).

Ch4EmissionRate.description: The CH4 emissions rate. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

Ch4EmissionRateInTgwh.description: The CH4 emissions rate in tonnes per gigawatt hour. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

Ch4EmissionRateUnit.description: The unit of measure for the CH4 output emission rate.

City.description: The city for which this electricity emissions factor set is valid.

Co2EmissionRate.description: The CO2 emissions rate. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

Co2EmissionRateInTmwh.description: The CO2 emissions rate in tonnes per megawatt-hour. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

Co2EmissionRateUnit.description: The unit of measure for the CO2 output emission rate.

Co2eEmissionRate.description: The total annual CO2 equivalent output emission rate for a grid subregion that’s calculated using the location-based method. This value will override the value calculated by using CO2, CH4, and N2O factors.

Co2eEmissionRateInTmwh.description: The total annual CO2 equivalent output emission rate in tonnes per megawatt-hour.

Co2eEmissionRateUnit.description: The unit of measure for the total CO2 equivalent output emission rate.

Country.description: The country for which this electricity emissions factor set is valid.

EmissionFactorDataSource.description: The source of the emissions factor reference data.

EmissionFactorUpdateYear.description: The year in which this reference data for the emissions factor was most recently updated.

EmissionsFactorType.description: Indicates if this Electricity Emissions Factor is Location-based, Market-Based, or both.

ExternalIdentifier.description: External Id of this emissions factor

GenlConversionFctrRevisionDate.description: The date when the electricity grid reference data for the emissions factors record is revised by the publishing authority.

GridSubregion.description: The electricity grid subregion for which this electricity emissions factor set is valid.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LocBasedGeothermalMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from geothermal source based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocBasedOtherFossilFuelMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from other fossil fuels based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocBasedRenewableEnergyPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from renewable resources such as biomass, geothermal, solar, wind, and hydroelectricity that's calculated based on the location-based data.

LocBsdRenewableEnrgyNonHydro.description: The percentage of electricity generated from renewable resources such as biomass, geothermal, solar, and wind that's calculated based on the location-based data.

LocationBasedBiomassMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from biomass based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocationBasedCoalMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from coal based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocationBasedGasMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from gas based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocationBasedHydroMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from hydroelectric power source based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocationBasedMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from all sources based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocationBasedNuclearMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from nuclear power source based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocationBasedOilMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from oil based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocationBasedOtherFuelMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from other fuels based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocationBasedSolarMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from solar photovoltaic cells based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

LocationBasedWindMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from wind based on the region's grid mix data from governmental or non-governmental organizations.

MarketBasedBiomassMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from biomass based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MarketBasedCoalMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from coal based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MarketBasedGasMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from gas based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MarketBasedHydroMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from hydroelectric power source based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MarketBasedMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from all sources based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MarketBasedNuclearMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from nuclear power source based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MarketBasedOilMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from oil based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MarketBasedOtherFuelMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from other fuels based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MarketBasedSolarMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from solar photovoltaic cells based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MarketBasedWindMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from wind based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MktBasedGeothermalMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from geothermal power source based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MktBasedOtherFossilFuelMixPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from other fossil fuels based on the grid mix data from the electricity supplier.

MktBasedRenewableEnergyPct.description: The percentage of electricity generated from renewable resources such as biomass, geothermal, solar, wind, and hydroelectricity that's calculated based on the market-based data.

MktBsdCh4EmssnRate.description: The rate of market-based CH4 emissions. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

MktBsdCh4EmssnRateUnit.description: Specifies the unit of measure for the rate of market-based CH4 emissions output.

MktBsdCh4EmssnRtInTgwh.description: The rate of market-based CH4 emissions in tonnes per gigawatt hour. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

MktBsdCo2EmssnRate.description: The rate of market-based CO2 emissions. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

MktBsdCo2EmssnRateUnit.description: Specifies the unit of measure for the rate of market-based CO2 emissions output.

MktBsdCo2EmssnRtInTmwh.description: The rate of market-based CO2 emissions in tonnes per megawatt hour. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

MktBsdCo2eEmissionRate.description: The annual carbon dioxide equivalent output emission rate that's calculated based on the market-based data of the electricity grid subregion.

MktBsdCo2eEmissionRateInTmwh.description: The annual carbon dioxide equivalent output emission rate that's calculated based on the market-based data.

MktBsdCo2eEmissionRateUnit.description: The unit of measure for the carbon dioxide equivalent market-based output emission rate.

MktBsdDataSrcType.description: Specifies the type of data source of the market-based conversion factor for the electricity emissions factor.

MktBsdElectrSupplierId.description: The supplier of electricity associated with this electricity emissions factor.

MktBsdN2oEmssnRate.description: The rate of market-based N2O emissions. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

MktBsdN2oEmssnRateUnit.description: Specifies the unit of measure for the rate of market-based N2O emissions output.

MktBsdN2oEmssnRtInTgwh.description: The rate of market-based N2O emissions in tonnes per gigawatt hour. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

MktBsdRenewableEnrgyNonHydro.description: The percentage of electricity generated from renewable resources such as biomass, geothermal, solar, and wind that's calculated based on the market-based data.

N2oEmissionRate.description: The N2O emissions rate. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

N2oEmissionRateInTgwh.description: The N2O emissions rate in tonnes per gigawatt hour. This field is informational only and doesn’t impact the carbon dioxide equivalent calculations.

N2oEmissionRateUnit.description: The unit of measure for the N2O output emission rate.

OtherEmssnFctrId.description: The other emissions factor set record containing global warming potential values for CH4 and N2O.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PostalCodeSet.description: The valid postal codes for this electricity emissions factor set.

ReferenceDataLoadLogId.description: The reference data load log record that's associated with the emissions factor.

ShouldLockDtastUpdtForRec.description: Indicates whether the emissions factor record can be locked from dataset updates.

State.description: The state for which this electricity emissions factor set is valid.
